document.full_text: israel has come under intensified pressure to make a substantive offer to the palestinians or risk a vote in the united nations general assembly to recognize palestine as a state.
document.title: warning by israeli on u.n. nod to palestinians
lines_and_colors: israel has come under intensified pressure to make a substantive offer to the palestinians or risk a vote in the united nations general assembly to recognize palestine as a state.
